title: Х-версии. Громкие дела
overview: There are questions the answers to which cannot be found either on the Internet or in the library. Crimes unsolved for many years, high-profile disasters, mysterious historical figures, cursed places that have ruined more than one life... Host of the X-version project. High-profile cases" Dmitry Shtokolov and famous psychics Fatima Khadueva, Mikhail Nevsky and Alexander Litvin take on any investigation.
